mainEntity.name: How long does the hearing quiz take?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Soundbites hearing assessment takes approximately 2 minutes to complete. You'll answer 10 questions about your hearing health and listening habits.
Yes, the Soundbites hearing quiz is completely free. You'll receive personalized recommendations based on your assessment results.

mainEntity.name: What do I get after completing the quiz?

acceptedAnswer.text: After completing the quiz, you'll receive a personalized hearing score and recommendations. You can optionally enter your email to receive detailed results and product suggestions.
